kubejs.ponder.our_first_scene.header: Learning about how to store items digitally in applied energistics 2!
kubejs.ponder.our_first_scene.text_1: This block is used for digital storage, you can add digital storage disks to store lots of items within one block
kubejs.ponder.our_first_scene.text_2: You can interact with the block and add storage drives to store items or replace existing storage drives with bigger drives to enable you to store more items
kubejs.ponder.section_fading.header: Let's learn about the energy acceptor
kubejs.ponder.section_fading.text_1: This block can be used to accept energy to power your applied energistics 2 system using power sources from other mods
